description: This file defines API endpoints for managing financial transactions, categories, and budgets within a finance tracking backend. It uses FastAPI and SQLAlchemy to handle CRUD operations, authentication dependencies, and data serialization schemas.

classes.name: Transaction
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing a financial transaction.

classes.name: Category
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model representing a transaction category.

classes.name: TransactionType
classes.description: SQLAlchemy model or enum representing transaction types.

methods.name: create_transaction( transaction_in: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Creates a new transaction for the authenticated user.

methods.name: list_transactions( skip: int = 0, limit: int = 50, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Lists transactions of the current user with pagination.

methods.name: get_transaction(transaction_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves a transaction by ID, ensuring ownership.

methods.name: update_transaction(transaction_id: int, req: TransactionCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates an existing transaction for the current user.

methods.name: delete_transaction(transaction_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Deletes a transaction owned by the current user.

methods.name: create_category(category_in: CategoryCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new category if it doesn't exist.

methods.name: list_budgets(db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Lists budgets for the current user.

methods.name: create_budget(budget_in: BudgetCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Creates a new budget for the current user.

methods.name: delete_budget(budget_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Deletes a budget owned by the current user.

methods.name: get_budget(budget_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Retrieves a budget by ID, ensuring ownership.

methods.name: update_budget(budget_id: int, req: BudgetCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user: User = Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Updates an existing budget for the current user.
